name: bls-signatures-pod
summary: BLS signatures in C++, using the relic toolkit
description: Implements BLS signatures with aggregation as in Boneh, Drijvers, Neven 2018, using relic toolkit for cryptographic primitives (pairings, EC, hashing). The BLS12-381 curve is used.
prepare_command:
RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-arm"
RELIC_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-armv7s"
RELIC_X64_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-x86"
RELIC_I386_TARGET_DIR="relic-target-i386"

BLS_ARM_TARGET_DIR="bls-target-arm"
BLS_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR="bls-target-armv7s"
BLS_X64_TARGET_DIR="bls-target-x86"
BLS_I386_TARGET_DIR="bls-target-i386"


# build relic

pushd contrib/relic

SHA256_HASH="f01aec9c094be1cd00d094c83c14bb2730a0741f845c78e8568884bcbdcd3204"
curl -o ios.toolchain.cmake https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leetal/ios-cmake/6ea5db18f9a05b4103e2aca665374b94c119fbed/ios.toolchain.cmake
DOWNLOADED_HASH=`shasum -a 256 ios.toolchain.cmake | cut -f 1 -d " "`
if [ $SHA256_HASH != $DOWNLOADED_HASH ]; then
  echo "Error: sha256 checksum of ios.toolchain.cmake mismatch" >&2
  exit 1
fi


mkdir "$RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR"

export CC=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch arm64"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=64 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" -DARCH=ARM -DOPSYS=NONE -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS64 -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../ios.toolchain.cmake ../
make

popd # "$RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$RELIC_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$RELIC_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR"

export CC=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch armv7s"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=32 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" -DARCH=ARM -DOPSYS=NONE -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS -DIOS_ARCH=armv7s -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../ios.toolchain.cmake ../
make

popd # "$RELIC_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$RELIC_X64_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$RELIC_X64_TARGET_DIR"

unset CC
export CC=`xcrun --sdk macosx --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch x86_64"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=64 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" ../
make

popd # "$RELIC_X64_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$RELIC_I386_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$RELIC_I386_TARGET_DIR"

unset CC
export CC=`xcrun --sdk macosx --find clang`

ARCHFLAGS="-arch i386"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`

cmake -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=easy -DFP_PRIME=381 -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP" -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops -fomit-frame-pointer $INCLUDES -isysroot $SYSROOT $ARCHFLAGS -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=32 -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DDSEED="UDEV" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" ../
make

popd # "$RELIC_I386_TARGET_DIR"


xcrun lipo -create "${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" "${RELIC_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" "${RELIC_X64_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" "${RELIC_I386_TARGET_DIR}/lib/librelic_s.a" -output "librelic_universal.a"

popd # contrib/relic


# build BLS

BLS_FILES=( "aggregationinfo" "bls" "chaincode" "extendedprivatekey" "extendedpublickey" "privatekey" "publickey" "signature" )
ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES=$(printf "%s.o " "${BLS_FILES[@]}")


mkdir "$BLS_ARM_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$BLS_ARM_TARGET_DIR"

ARCH="arm64"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-path`
CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

for F in "${BLS_FILES[@]}"
do
  clang -I"../contrib/relic/include" -I"../contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/include" -I"../src/" -x c++ -std=c++14 -stdlib=libc++ -arch "${ARCH}" -isysroot "${SYSROOT}" -mios-simulator-version-min=10.0 -c "../src/${F}.cpp" -o "${CURRENT_DIR}/${F}.o"
done

ar -cvq libbls.a $ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES

popd # "$BLS_ARM_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$BLS_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$BLS_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR"

ARCH="armv7s"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-path`
CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

for F in "${BLS_FILES[@]}"
do
  clang -I"../contrib/relic/include" -I"../contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR}/include" -I"../src/" -x c++ -std=c++14 -stdlib=libc++ -arch "${ARCH}" -isysroot "${SYSROOT}" -mios-simulator-version-min=10.0 -c "../src/${F}.cpp" -o "${CURRENT_DIR}/${F}.o"
done

ar -cvq libbls.a $ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES

popd # "$BLS_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$BLS_X64_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$BLS_X64_TARGET_DIR"

ARCH="x86_64"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`
CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

for F in "${BLS_FILES[@]}"
do
  clang -I"../contrib/relic/include" -I"../contrib/relic/${RELIC_X64_TARGET_DIR}/include" -I"../src/" -x c++ -std=c++14 -stdlib=libc++ -arch "${ARCH}" -isysroot "${SYSROOT}" -c "../src/${F}.cpp" -o "${CURRENT_DIR}/${F}.o"
done

ar -cvq libbls.a $ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES

popd # "$BLS_X64_TARGET_DIR"


mkdir "$BLS_I386_TARGET_DIR"
pushd "$BLS_I386_TARGET_DIR"

ARCH="i386"
SYSROOT=`xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path`
CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

for F in "${BLS_FILES[@]}"
do
  clang -I"../contrib/relic/include" -I"../contrib/relic/${RELIC_I386_TARGET_DIR}/include" -I"../src/" -x c++ -std=c++14 -stdlib=libc++ -arch "${ARCH}" -isysroot "${SYSROOT}" -c "../src/${F}.cpp" -o "${CURRENT_DIR}/${F}.o"
done

ar -cvq libbls.a $ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES

popd # "$BLS_I386_TARGET_DIR"


xcrun lipo -create "${BLS_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/libbls.a" "${BLS_ARMV7S_TARGET_DIR}/libbls.a" "${BLS_X64_TARGET_DIR}/libbls.a" "${BLS_I386_TARGET_DIR}/libbls.a" -output "libbls_universal.a"


# make relic_conf.h platform independent

sed 's/#define WSIZE.*/#ifdef __LP64__    #define WSIZE 64    #else    #define WSIZE 32    #endif/g' "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h" > "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h.new"

rm "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h"
mv "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h.new" "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h"
